Posts.Content: Sep 1, 2018 06:56PM - edited Sep 1, 2018 07:00PM by juniperwillow Good luck with your surgery! Mine is scheduled for Thursday September 6th. I am having a Left nipple and skin sparing mastectomy. I am feeling extremely nervous as I've never had any surgery let alone something this big. Just want to get it over with and start healing. Radiation will begin about 6 weeks afterwards.
